channel.title: Arts on Shawn T. O'Neil
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on Shawn T. O'Neil

item.title: Stained Glass
item.description: These were made between 2012 and 2015, some at a studio in Marquette, MI, and some at the Notre Dame Glass Club.

item.title: Marble Making Timelapse
item.description: A timelapse video of me making a marble at the Oregon State University Craft Center. Fun fact: the title logo in the video is the result of a custom processing.org program, though I’m not sure where that code lives now…

item.title: Glass Beads
item.description: Work in borosilicate glass, mostly done between 2011 and 2013 at the University of Notre Dame Glass Club.
